title: Hurricane Ian’s Financial Toll Threatens Florida’s Real Estate Market
description: The hurricane’s record-breaking cost will make it even harder for many to get insurance, experts say — threatening home sales, mortgages and construction.
dc:creator: Christopher Flavelle
media:credit: Callaghan O'Hare for The New York Times
media:description: Cleanup in the aftermath of Hurricane Ian in Fort Myers Beach, Fla., on Oct. 5.
